title:
Resolvent and spectrum for discrete symplectic systems in the limit
  point case
abstract:
The spectrum of an arbitrary self-adjoint extension of the minimal linear
relation associated with the discrete symplectic system in the limit point case
is completely characterized by using the limiting Weyl--Titchmarsh
$M_+(\lambda)$-function. Furthermore, a dependence of the spectrum on a
boundary condition is investigated and, consequently, several results of the
singular Sturmian theory are derived.
